markdown:
May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands **Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 77 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Range** 30 feet **Target** 1 creature **Saving Throw** Will **Duration** sustained up to 1 minute --- You lock minds with the target, trying to mentally subdue them. The target must attempt a Will save. Each time you Sustain this Spell, the target attempts another Will save. **Critical Success** You are [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) and the spell ends.
**Success** The target is unaffected.
**Failure** The target is stunned 1.
**Critical Failure** The target is stunned 2.
name: Mind Games
search_markdown:

</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

 

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Will

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You lock minds with the target, trying to mentally subdue them.
</summary>

text: Mind Games May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands Source Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic pg. 77 Traditions Arcane, Occult Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Saving Throw Will Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You lock minds with the target, trying to mentally subdue them. The target must attempt a Will save. Each time you Sustain this Spell, the target attempts another Will save. Critical Success You are stunned 1 and the spell ends. Success The target is unaffected. Failure The target is stunned 1. Critical Failure The target is stunned 2.
